original_title: Celebrating Ennio Morricone: - THE SECRETS BEHIND HIS GENIUS
overview: CAM Sugar & Decca Records present "CELEBRATING ENNIO MORRICONE: THE SECRETS BEHIND HIS GENIUS", featuring tracks from the new album Morricone Segreto, the first posthumous release of the Maestro.
tagline: Its historical collaborators hear a preview of a taste of Morricone Segreto.
title: Celebrating Ennio Morricone: - THE SECRETS BEHIND HIS GENIUS
